name: Tomte Trouble
storyline: A gust of icy wind blew open Kimmy's front door, allowing her curious tomte to mosey out and travel through a magical door. Jump, avoid critters and falling ice, then catch all of your tomte as quickly as possible.
summary: Tomte Trouble is a single-screen platformer for the Game Boy Color. Collect all of the tomte and progress through sixteen bite-sized stages.
